General.Name: Public Joint Stock Company Varyoganneftegaz
General.Description: Public Joint Stock Company Varyoganneftegaz engages in the search, exploration, operation, production, and sale of oil, natural gas, and gas condensate. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Raduzhny, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company Varyoganneftegaz operates as a subsidiary of Independent Oil And Gas Company-Holding, LLC.
